title: MBA Candidate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at INSEAD (Fontainebleau)
Interview Descriptions: I had two interviews, each with an INSEAD MBA alumni. The process was pretty efficient and they kept to the timelines they promised. The recruitment staff were not as friendly or helpful as other business schools
Interview Questions: Why INSEAD? Why an MBA? Why now? What do you want to do next?

title: Réceptionniste Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at INSEAD (Créteil) in Feb 2022
Interview Descriptions:
L'accueil
La présentation du candidat
La présentation de l'entreprise et du poste proposé
La discussion autour de l'expérience du candidat
La conclusion et la fin
Écoutez, observez le candidat

Repérer les points clés du CV/ lettre de motivation
Prévoir un lieu calme
Préparer des questions
Envoyer un mail clair et précis au candidat sur les infos pratiques du RDV
Préparer le test d’aptitude/ personnalité
Préparer une présentation vendeuse de l’entreprise
Interview Questions: Qu’apportez vous a notre entreprise de plus que les autres

title: Programme Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at INSEAD
Interview Descriptions:
Nothing particular about the interview, except that the recruiter didn't tell us in advance how we will get in touch. 

I was told I would be contacted in a week. Three weeks went by without any response. I didn't expect that from one of the top business schools.
Interview Questions: Do you need sponsorship for the visa?

title: HR Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at INSEAD
Interview Descriptions: severals phone interviews for the screening process followed by a skype interviews and subsequently several face to face interviews all in one day. The offer was made the following week.
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself from a very young age

title: MBA Candidate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at INSEAD (Paris) in Apr 2019
Interview Descriptions: I had to pass 2 interviews with the alumni. It was actually a great experience. Bith interviews were in free form, meaning that I presented my self, and then I've been asked questions regarding my background and motivations.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to do an MBA?

title: Research Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at INSEAD (Paris) in Feb 2015
Interview Descriptions: entretien téléphonique avec les RH puis rencontre avec le professeur dirigeant la recherche. Discussion sur le poste et les avantages d'être à INSEAD. Beaucoup de discussion sur le fait que le poste soit basé à Fontainebleau donc long de trajet pour les employés de Paris.
Interview Questions: Pourquoi etes-vous intéressé par la recherche?

title: Systems Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at INSEAD (Fontainebleau) in Jan 2014
Interview Descriptions:
- entretient téléphonique avec la RH sur le parcours du candidat
- entretient technique via skype (singapore) avec le responsable d'equipe technique
- entretient RH sur site et discussion des avantages et salaire
Interview Questions: Comment gérer la limite des listes sharepoint ?

title: Business Development Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at INSEAD (Saint-Franc) in Jun 2013
Interview Descriptions:
Fairly straight forward - 3x rounds with HR included
Line manager provided most of the questions followed by the head of department who basically validated if the hire was suitable. Selection process from interview to offer stage took less than a month
Interview Questions: What skills and competencies you think is needed to be successful in this role?

title: Directeur Administratif Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at INSEAD (Fontainebleau)
Interview Descriptions: Entretien à plusieurs étapes en français
Interview Questions: On m'a demandé de fournir une explication détaillée de ma plus grande réussite.

title: Directeur Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at INSEAD (Fontainebleau) in Jan 2010
Interview Descriptions: Plusieurs entretiens pour vérifier vos motivations et capacités
Interview Questions: Pour vous, quel sera le futur de l'éducation
